activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Richard J Irvin

defendant.name: Irvin, Richard J
defendant.address: Eau Claire County Jail, 710 2nd Avenue, Eau Claire, WI 54703

records.addlTxt:
1:01 PM Defendant Richard J Irvin in court, in custody.  Attorney Joseph J. Kaupie appeared by video for Richard J Irvin.  Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter appeared by Zoom telephone means.  
Warrant quashed. Court reinstates signature bond. Written waiver of preliminary hearing filed and confirmed on the record. Court accepts the waiver and binds the defendant over for trial. 
Defendant to appear in person. Attorney Kaupie may appear by zoom video if a plea will not occur.
Arraignment scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant's Written Waiver of Preliminary Examination

1:42 PM Defendant Richard J Irvin not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joseph J. Kaupie appeared by video for Richard J Irvin. Attorney Brian Wright appears for the state.   Attorney Kaupie relates.  State moves for warrant.  Court authorizes bench warrant, body only, WI and adjacent states.
Preliminary hearing on September 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Richard J Irvin
Current: Eau Claire County Jail, 710 2nd Avenue, Eau Claire, WI 54703 United States  (Effective: 08-23-2022)
Prior: 11 E La Salle Ave, Apt C, Barron, WI 54812

10:00 AM Defendant Richard J Irvin appeared by video, in custody from Eau Claire County Jail.  Attorney Joseph J. Kaupie appeared by video for Richard J Irvin.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reporter appeared by video.
Attorney Kaupie relates.  Reading of Complaint waived, preliminary hearing requested and time limits waived.  Bond continued.  Next hearing may be by zoom.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

DE does not appear.  Attorney Kaupie appears on behalf of DE. Brady Seidlitz appears for the state. Attorney Kaupie relates DE is currently in Eau Claire County Jail and requests a reset to allow DE to appear by Zoom.  Court relates and resets AIA to 8/19/2022 at 10:00 AM.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages. 
May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold.
Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.

1:20 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Richard J Irvin appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Richard J Irvin.
Court relates. Defendant needs to contact Public Defender's office today to see if he qualifies.  State requests signature bond.  Attorney Rockow does not object.  Defendant must appear in person for next court date.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.
